member.name: T:CaliCamp.Models.Dtos.ImageUploadDto
member.summary: Data transfer object for uploading images

member.name: P:CaliCamp.Models.Dtos.ImageUploadDto.Base64Image
member.summary: The base64 encoded image data. Should include the data URI scheme (e.g., data:image/jpeg;base64,)

member.name: P:CaliCamp.Models.Dtos.ImageUploadDto.FileName
member.summary: The name of the image file, including extension

member.name: P:CaliCamp.Models.Dtos.ImageUploadDto.CampingSpotId
member.summary: The ID of the camping spot this image belongs to

member.name: P:CaliCamp.Models.Dtos.ImageUploadDto.UploadedBy
member.summary: The ID of the user who is uploading the image
